summary.span: O namespace contém tipos que são compatíveis com o Modelo de Aplicativo do Visual Basic e fornecem acesso a informações do aplicativo.

span.span: The namespace contains types that support the Visual Basic Application Model and provide access to application information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Para obter mais informações sobre o modelo de aplicativo do Visual Basic, consulte [visão geral do modelo de aplicativo do Visual Basic](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/development-with-my/overview-of-the-visual-basic-application-model.md).For more information about the Visual Basic Application Model, see [Overview of the Visual Basic Application Model](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/development-with-my/overview-of-the-visual-basic-application-model.md).
